dcterms:description: A dataset containing dynamic scenes used for training and evaluating novel view synthesis methods, focusing on the synthesis of views from previously unseen perspectives.

dcterms:description: A dataset designed for the synthesis of novel views of dynamic scenes, utilizing globally coherent depths from monocular camera inputs.
